TopicTitle: Need recruits for a starmade faction (Nextech Enterprises Recruiting)

Articles.Content:
> 
> Lesson learned: Always dock your ships.

The AUS-2 was docked. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I think I currently own the most powerful ship in our faction (Besides potentially the Firestorm, though I don't know it's weapons loadout). One main missile launcher that does 3.8 million damage, swarm launcher (38 missiles) to distract AI turrets and do moderate (650) damage per missile, six AI missile launchers that fire two homing missiles each every 16 seconds for 6k(?) damage, a really cruddy beam turret that I'm going to get rid of, and two AMC machine gun turrets that do 500 damage per second. It is almost 300 meters long, and has over 500k shields. And it's only about halfway done. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I plan on reworking a few weapons and adding more weapons and shields.

Should we continue to accept every stray factionless member of this server, or should we be more careful in our selections?

> 
> The AUS-2 was docked. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
> I think I currently own the most powerful ship in our faction (Besides potentially the Firestorm, though I don't know it's weapons loadout). One main missile launcher that does 3.8 million damage, swarm launcher (38 missiles) to distract AI turrets and do moderate (650) damage per missile, six AI missile launchers that fire two homing missiles each every 16 seconds for 6k(?) damage, a really cruddy beam turret that I'm going to get rid of, and two AMC machine gun turrets that do 500 damage per second. It is almost 300 meters long, and has over 500k shields. And it's only about halfway done. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I plan on reworking a few weapons and adding more weapons and shields.
> 
> Should we continue to accept every stray factionless member of this server, or should we be more careful in our selections?

i would say continue to accept, they could be useful. but i would recommend you and the other main members set your faction block permissions on your ship to block them from doing anything with any of our major vessels. also good job on the ship! i've got a destroyer design i'd like to build, so when im online hopefully tomorrow i'll show it to you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

And please tell me how many members the faction has now if the number as changed since i logged off last night.

guys my starmade broke i wont be able to join for a while

Edit:i fixed it

> 
> guys my starmade broke i wont be able to join for a while

its ok, we have quite a few members now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) maybe you should try reinstalling it?

Is there an easier way to build turrets than to build a whole new ship and dock it with your base/ship? I get tired of having to move between my mothership and turrets when building. Also, how could I make some AI fighters undock with a mothership without switching to them? My current plan is to take out pirates by sending in a swarm of tough, small, disposable, easy-to-rebuild-from-blueprint drones while my mothership backs away and watches.

> 
> Is there an easier way to build turrets than to build a whole new ship and dock it with your base/ship? I get tired of having to move between my mothership and turrets when building. Also, how could I make some AI fighters undock with a mothership without switching to them? My current plan is to take out pirates by sending in a swarm of tough, small, disposable, easy-to-rebuild-from-blueprint drones while my mothership backs away and watches.

Sorry there is no way to make turrets without switching, and as for making drones just dock your drones to the mothership, Then activate the "bobby ai" module on each drone and then once your near enough to the pirates just go into build mode and delete the docking modules to release them.

btw i love your blue galaxy skybox i use it in several of my ksp installs.
im online now anyone wanna come online?
I've not played in a long time but I'm down. What do you need constructed, Herr Commander?

The new NXE-AUS *Kalzoria Star*, coming to a server near you soon. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> **Loadout:**
> 
> (2) 4-shot rocket launchers with lock-on effect, 56k damage per rocket, 15 second reload.
> 
> (1) Double-barrel antimatter cannon with machine-gun effect, 20,000 damage per second, 0.1 second reload.
> 
> **Defenses:**
> 
> (18) 6-barrel Anti-Missile Turrets (AMC with machine gun effect)
> 
> (7) Double-barrel Missile Turrets, 10k damage per rocket, 15 second reload.
> 
> **Statistics:**
> 
> Mass: 6,814
> 
> Shields: 621,000 (Recharge: 48k/s)
> 
> Power: 4.5 million (Recharge: 870k e/s)
> 
> Hitpoints: 4.4 million
> 
> Armor Hitpoints: 1.2 million
> 
> The ship also features an escape pod for when things turn south. Jump drive and radar jammer are included.

looks effin awesome

> 
> looks effin awesome

Thanks. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I've got a few kinks to work out still... mainly that the turrets seem to be rebellious. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I'll change their targeting to "Any" instead of "Selected".

Might put some more details on it... namely more of the hattel wedges. There are also several large hollow areas that could be filled with miscellaneous odds and ends.

Did I not put the dimensions? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif) 129 meters long, 53 meters wide, 23 meters tall.

Of course, now I've got a different design in my head that I need to work on. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) I'm happy with this one though. (Except for the fact that it doesn't flare out near the end like I feel it should. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) Will be fixed in the next craft.)

EDIT:

Ooh, I know what it's missing. Ribbing.

This looks cool, but I wonder what I would do if you put me in the faction.
Well, there is a lot you can do in Nextech, but more importantly, what can you do in starmade and what do *you* want to do in the game with us?

> 
> This looks cool, but I wonder what I would do if you put me in the faction.

Fight pirates, fight players (We haven't done that yet), mine resources, capture territory, build stations and ships, whatever you want to, really. The list goes on forever.

(It's on my to-do list to make a large-ish permacloak ship to mess with people at spawn. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))
